entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:29 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:29 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:29 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:29 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:29 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
